abstract: As recently described, Ki-1 anaplastic large cell lymphoma is a distinctive subtype of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma. We report a Ki-1 anaplastic large cell lymphoma of the duodenum in a 62-year-old man. He received modified CHOP therapy and was in complete remission at 18 months. To our knowledge, this is the first report of primary Ki-1 anaplastic large cell lymphoma of the duodenum.
title: Case report: primary CD30 (Ki-1)-positive anaplastic large cell lymphoma of the duodenum.
